divs: Sighting DetailsLast night around 8:30 in the evening I was sitting on my balcony on the beach gulf of Mexico and I looked to my right and I saw a burning yellow orange object come down about 100 feet or so flaming to be exact I thought for a moment this was a shooting star but quickly dismissed as they are white then within 10 seconds 2 more came down I was in disbelief I ran to my room and grabbed my iPhone when I got back or was gone. I tried to reason withy self to what this was and just said wow what was that no sooner then a minute later is when they just started dropping from the sky I thought it was parachutes. But the way these came down were as if they were , but parachute jumpers don't have flames on there parachutes I was in shock and FaceTime my sister she seen them to the best of her ability there were about four at that time she hung up and I started to record . I also thought it might have been meteor shower but they don't fall from the sky and hover then dissipate and make a right turn into horizon of gulf. I also asked any residents in building of they say anything and they said no. I really don't have an explanation for what I these were about 10 or more or so but I do know what I saw. I am a type of person to have facts or reason and do not just say oh I saw a UFO I really don't know what this was but it was not anything I have ever witnessed as a human on this planet .
Summary: Last night April 14 2012 around 8:30 in the evening I was sitting on my balcony on the gulf Mexico I saw A very bright flaming object fall from sky I was in disbelief as I tried to rationalize this I am not a person to say what it was bu
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
